content: chase away winter chills with a stylish hat to match cafe au lait mittens 1 it has an easy to remember lace pattern and knits up quickly many thanks to kysara 2 for the german translation **errata** the note at the beginning of the crown decreases should read start the first repeat only on round 1 with the stitch just slipped k3 instead of k4 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/cafe-au-lait-mittens 2 http //www ravelry com/people/kysara
